title: Contents of the Dead Man's Pockets
description: Free online fiction.He was gambling his life for a piece of paper. If he lost, not even his wife would understand.places: New York, NY: Lexington Avenue, Wholesale Groceries, Public Library. Fifth Avenue, Loew's (theater), Fiftieth StreetOriginally published Collier's, October 26 1956
author: Jack Finney
